00022     double getSlope() {return slope;};

00025 
00026 protected:
00027

00040 class PLActiveSynapse : public ActiveSynapse {
00041 public:
00042 
00043     virtual ~PLActiveSynapse();
00044 
00045 protected:
00046     void updatePSRSlope(double new_slope, Time time) {
00047         slope_old = slope;
00048         slope = new_slope;
00049         target_nrn->updatePSRSlope(slope, slope - slope_old, time);
00050     }
00051 
00052     void resetPSRSlope() {
00053         slope = slope_old = 0;
00054     }
00055 
00056     double slope;
00057     double slope_old;
00058 };

00061 template<class BaseSyn>
00062 class GenericPLBasicSynapse : public BaseSyn {
00063 public:
00064 
00065     GenericPLBasicSynapse(float W = 1)
00066     {
00067         this->W = W;
00068         this->syn_resp = 0;
00069     };
00070 
00071     virtual ~GenericPLBasicSynapse() {};
00072 
00073     double W;
00074 
00075     virtual void reset(SimContext &sim_ctxt)
00076     {
00077         BaseSyn::resetPSRs();
00078         BaseSyn::resetPSRSlope();
00079     };
00080 
00081     virtual void setPostSynResponse(SpikeResponse *response) {
00082         syn_resp = response;
00083     }
00084 
00085     virtual void updateState(SimContext &sim_ctxt, Time time, update_id_t upd_id)
00086     {
00087         BaseSyn::updatePSR(W*syn_resp->get(), time);
00088         BaseSyn::updatePSRSlope(W*syn_resp->getSlope(), time);
00089     }
00090 
00091 protected:
00092     SpikeResponse *syn_resp;
00093 };
